title: Pediatric Emergency Airway Intubation Skill Training: Simulation-Based Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic first-aid knowledge and adult airway management techniques
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, targeting general citizens to strengthen practical competencies in pediatric emergency response

learning_goals: Learners can understand pediatric airway anatomy and explain age-appropriate intubation techniques
Learners can perform pediatric airway intubation procedures with 80% accuracy for three consecutive attempts using mobile simulation tools
Learners can complete intubation protocols within 10 minutes through role distribution among team members in realistic crisis scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
